name: August 2024 (Carries) (Only the carry version is available for this bingo)

steps.instruction:
Craft Farm Suit Helmet &b%1&r
Craft Farm Suit Chestplate &b%2&r
Craft Farm Suit Leggings &b%3&r
Craft Farm Suit Boots &b%4&r

Buy Red Mushrooms&r &b%1&r
Buy Rookie Hoe &b%2

Craft Nether Wart Minion III &b%1&r
Craft Potion Affinity Talisman &b%2

steps.criteria: [NPC] Librarian: Greetings! Welcome to the Library!
[NPC] Blacksmith: I'm the town Blacksmith! I can reforge items for you, for a price.

steps.instruction:
Buy Coal &b%1&r
Buy Gold Ingot &b%2&r
&fBuy Promising Pickaxe&r &b%3&r
Buy Black Diamond &b%4&r

Farm Pumpkin &b%1&r
Farm Melon Block &b%2&r
&7(Use gold axe)

Craft Chicken Minion I &b%1&r
Craft Cow Minion I &b%2
Craft Pig Minion I &b%3

steps.criteria: You picked up a minion! You currently have

steps.instruction:
Place Chicken and Cow Minion
&7(Give 3 cheese to chicken)

Do your daily superpairs
&7(Remember to get at least 1 pair)

Unlock Mushroom Collection 3
&7(Use gold axe on big mushrooms)

Craft Mushroom Helmet &b%1&r
Craft Mushroom Chestplate &b%2&r
Craft Mushroom Leggings &b%3&r
Craft Mushroom Boots &b%4&r

Farm Cocoa Beans &b%1&r
Farm Sugar Cane &b%2

Unlock Sugar Cane Collection 2
&7(Optional if >= bingo rank 3)
steps.criteria: COLLECTION LEVEL UP Sugar Cane I➜II

steps.instruction:
Craft Speed Talisman &b%1&r
&7(Optional if >= bingo rank 3)
Apply Black Diamond to Promising Pickaxe
steps.doesntHave: Click the ANVIL BELOW to combine.

steps.instruction:
Craft Enchanted Coal &b%1
&7(Trade Oak Wood for Coal)

Kill Miner Zombie &b%1&r
Kill Miner Skeleton &b%2

steps.criteria: COLLECTION LEVEL UP Lapis Lazuli III➜IV

steps.instruction: Apply Black Diamond to Fractured Mithril Pickaxe
steps.doesntHave: Click the ANVIL BELOW to combine.

steps.criteria: [NPC] Lone Adventurer: Try killing 5 of them!

steps.instruction:
Obtain Ender Helmet &b%1&r
Obtain Ender Chestplate &b%2&r
Obtain Ender Leggings &b%3&r
Obtain Ender Boots &b%4&r
&7(Upgrade Enderman Minion)

Claim Archaeologist's Compass &b%1&r
&7(Optional if bingo rank 4)

Kill Spiders to get String &b%1&r
Kill Spiders to get Spider Eye &b%2&r

Buy Zombie Talisman &b%1&r
Buy Skeleton Talisman &b%2&r
Buy Village Affinity Talisman &b%3&r
Buy Mine Affinity Talisman &b%4&r
Buy Intimidation Talisman &b%5&r
Buy Scavenger Talisman &b%6&r

Buy Birch Wood &b%1&r
Buy Spruce Wood &b%2&r
Buy Dark Oak Wood &b%3&r
Buy Acacia Wood &b%4&r
Buy Jungle Wood &b%5&r
&7(Skip if no space in echest)
Apply Dirt Bottle to End Sword
steps.doesntHave: Click the ANVIL BELOW to combine.

steps.instruction:
Buy Iron Armor
Buy Rosetta's Armor

steps.criteria: [NPC] Sam: Head over to the desk, there you can browse SkyMart to order some fuel.
